resources.string: Practice daily and the result will not be long in coming
Not bad, but you need to complete at least %1$d rounds to finish this level and get more than %2$d percent correct answers. \n Will you try again?
Complete the previous exercise successfully at least five times to gain access to this one.

In this digital world, we are easily distracted. Information is everywhere and we feel the need to deal with increasing and multiple forms of information. It drags on our time and our attention. The inability to concentrate on the task at hand is one of the maladies of our time â€” everyone wants to know how to focus better, how to concentrate. This application was design to help you improve your concentration skill by doing simple exercises
